ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, that really does. I can t but think, though, that if people start successfully writing cheat programs for EverQuest, they won t have as noble a
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, that really does. I can't but think, though, that if people start
successfully writing cheat programs for EverQuest, they won't have as noble
a purpose as you. I'll shut up now. )

Macabre

----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 8:38 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> ok...
>
> I have lots of fun not cheating and in every game I play I have at least
one
> 100% legit character, and I play that character to have fun not
cheating...
>
> but other times I feel like just roamping around the game with a hacked
> character to have fun with things my real character can't touch/see yet.
>
> Right now I'd love to go take a look at Lady Vox (just see her in the
game,
> not kill her, just look) but I have a feeling that if my 8th level
Half-Elf
> Druid did manage to get to her somehow I'd see that familiar LOADING...
> PLEASE WAIT msg before I could blink.
>
> make more sense now?
>
> Omeg
>
